Content:
HI all
I am thinking of my next build and basing it off the Honda Helix 250, its a single cyliner carburated scooter with a CVT, peppy with a max OEM speed of about 75 - 80 mph
I was thinking of a project bike and perhaps just swpping the motor with say a majesty 400, but there will be fitment and other issues, part of my thinking was to just do engine work oh this bike and "upgrade" it,,,Does anyone have ideas or suggestions that would really bring more juice to this motor, here is what I have come up with

1. bigbore kit to 300cc
2. turbocharger
3. valve or head work
4. camshaft upgrades

Ill take ideas for this project

TY all!
